ProjectTitle: Extreme pathway based metabolic network reduction in view of optimisation and control of bioprocesses
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/05/2024
Data: Will you use materials/samples? please list these in the tabel as well, these are considered physical data in the context of a DMP
Preservation: please note that onedrive is not intended for long term preservation of data, it expires when you leave KU Leuven; have a look at the storage guide for other solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: How will you add a license on the data if you are not openly sharing the data in a repository? Please clarify this section. For more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
